name: DataTable
description: DataTable displays data in tabular format.

properties.name: alwaysShowPaginator
properties.description: Whether to show it even there is only one page.

properties.name: breakpoint
properties.description: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when using stack responsive layout.

properties.name: cellMemo
properties.description:
Whether to enable cell memoization.

When the memoization is enabled, be sure to:
     1- Update the value prop (i.e., row data) to trigger a re-render of the cells of a given row.
     2- Where necessary, use the spread operator (...) when updating the value prop objs which creates new fresh
     objects and avoids mutating the same objects.

When the memoization is disabled, a re-render of the datatable will trigger a re-render of all cells, which can
lead to performance issues with large datasets and is therefore not recommended.

properties.name: cellMemoProps
properties.description:
The cell props to be checked at memoization.

Possible cell props are:
    'hostName', 'allowCellSelection', 'cellMemo', 'cellMemoProps', 'cellMemoPropsDepth', 'cellClassName', 'checkIcon', 'collapsedRowIcon',
    'field', 'resolveFieldData', 'column', 'cProps', 'dataKey', 'editMode', 'editing', 'editingMeta', 'onEditingMetaChange', 'editingKey',
    'getEditingRowData', 'expanded', 'expandedRowIcon', 'frozenRow', 'frozenCol', 'alignFrozenCol', 'index', 'isSelectable', 'onCheckboxChange',
    'onClick', 'onMouseDown', 'onMouseUp', 'onRadioChange', 'onRowEditCancel', 'onRowEditInit', 'onRowEditSave', 'onRowToggle', 'responsiveLayout',
    'rowData', 'rowEditorCancelIcon', 'rowEditorInitIcon', 'rowEditorSaveIcon', 'rowIndex', 'rowSpan', 'selectOnEdit', 'isRowSelected', 'isCellSelected',
    'selectionAriaLabel', 'showRowReorderElement', 'showSelectionElement', 'tabIndex', 'getTabIndex', 'tableProps', 'tableSelector', 'value',
    'getVirtualScrollerOption', 'ptCallbacks', 'metaData', 'unstyled', 'findNextSelectableCell', 'findPrevSelectableCell', 'findDownSelectableCell',
    'findUpSelectableCell', 'focusOnElement', 'focusOnInit', 'updateStickyPosition'

IMPORTANT: Including a function to be checked will in general disable the memoization in practice, since functions are
compared by reference.

properties.name: cellMemoPropsDepth
properties.description: The comparison depth when checking cell props (e.g., rowData) at memoization.

properties.name: cellSelection
properties.description: Whether to cell selection is enabled or not.

properties.name: checkIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the checkbox.

properties.name: children
properties.description: Used to get the child elements of the component.

properties.name: className
properties.description: Style class of the component.

properties.name: collapsedRowIcon
properties.description: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as collapsed.

properties.name: columnResizeMode
properties.description: Used to define the resize mode of the columns, valid values are "fit" and "expand".

properties.name: compareSelectionBy
properties.description: Algorithm to define if a row is selected, valid values are "equals" that compares by reference and "deepEquals" that compares all fields.

properties.name: contextMenuSelection
properties.description: Selected row in single mode or an array of values in multiple mode.

properties.name: csvSeparator
properties.description: Character to use as the csv separator.

properties.name: currentPageReportTemplate
properties.description: Template of the current page report element. Available placeholders are {currentPage}, {totalPages}, {rows}, {first}, {last} and {totalRecords}

properties.name: dataKey
properties.description: Name of the field that uniquely identifies a record in the data. Should be a unique business key to prevent re-rendering.

properties.name: defaultSortOrder
properties.description: Default sort order of an unsorted column.

properties.name: dragSelection
properties.description: When enabled, a rectangle that can be dragged can be used to make a range selection.

properties.name: editingRows
properties.description: A collection of rows to represent the current editing data in row edit mode.

properties.name: editMode
properties.description: Defines editing mode, options are "cell" and "row".

properties.name: emptyMessage
properties.description: Text to display when there is no data.

properties.name: expandableRowGroups
properties.description: Makes row groups toggleable, default is false.

properties.name: expandedRowIcon
properties.description: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as expanded.

properties.name: expandedRows
properties.description: A collection of rows or a map object row data keys that are expanded.

properties.name: exportFilename
properties.description: Name of the exported file.

properties.name: filterClearIcon
properties.description: Icon to display when the filter can be cleared.

properties.name: filterDelay
properties.description: Delay in milliseconds before filtering the data.

properties.name: filterDisplay
properties.description: Layout of the filter elements, valid values are "row" and "menu".

properties.name: filterIcon
properties.description: Icon to display the current filtering status.

properties.name: filterLocale
properties.description: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

properties.name: filters
properties.description: An array of FilterMetadata objects to provide external filters.

properties.name: first
properties.description: Index of the first row to be displayed.

properties.name: footer
properties.description: Custom footer content of the table.

properties.name: footerColumnGroup
properties.description: ColumnGroup component for footer.

properties.name: frozenRow
properties.description: Whether the row is frozen or not. Read-Only necessary for unstyled TypeScript definition.

properties.name: frozenValue
properties.description: Items of the frozen part in scrollable DataTable.

properties.name: frozenWidth
properties.description: Width of the frozen part in scrollable DataTable.

properties.name: globalFilter
properties.description: Value of the global filter to use in filtering.

properties.name: globalFilterFields
properties.description: Define fields to be filtered globally.

properties.name: globalFilterMatchMode
properties.description: Defines filterMatchMode; "startsWith", "contains", "endsWith", "equals", "notEquals", "in", "notIn", "lt", "lte", "gt", "gte" and "custom".

properties.name: groupRowsBy
properties.description: Used for either be grouped by a separate grouping row or using rowspan.

properties.name: header
properties.description: Custom header content of the table.

properties.name: headerColumnGroup
properties.description: ColumnGroup component for header.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.name: lazy
properties.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

properties.name: loading
properties.description: Displays a loader to indicate data load is in progress.

properties.name: loadingIcon
properties.description: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

properties.name: metaKeySelection
properties.description: Defines whether metaKey is requred or not for the selection. When true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually. On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

properties.name: multiSortMeta
properties.description: An array of SortMeta objects to sort the data by default in multiple sort mode.

properties.name: pageLinkSize
properties.description: Number of page links to display.

properties.name: paginator
properties.description: When specified as true, enables the pagination.

properties.name: paginatorClassName
properties.description: Style class of the paginator element.

properties.name: paginatorDropdownAppendTo
properties.description: DOM element instance where the overlay panel should be mounted. Valid values are any DOM Element and 'self'. The self value is used to render a component where it is located.

properties.name: paginatorLeft
properties.description: Content for the left side of the paginator.

properties.name: paginatorPosition
properties.description: Position of the paginator, options are "top","bottom" or "both".

properties.name: paginatorRight
properties.description: Content for the right side of the paginator.

properties.name: paginatorTemplate
properties.defaultValue: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink RowsPerPageDropdown
properties.description: Template of the paginator. For details, refer to the template section of the paginator documentation for further options.

properties.name: pt
properties.description: Uses to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

properties.name: ptOptions
properties.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

properties.name: removableSort
properties.description: When enabled, columns can have an un-sorted state.

properties.name: reorderableColumns
properties.description: When enabled, columns can be reordered using drag and drop.

properties.name: reorderableRows
properties.description: When enabled, rows can be reordered using drag and drop.

properties.name: reorderIndicatorDownIcon
properties.description: Defines the reorder indicator down icon.

properties.name: reorderIndicatorUpIcon
properties.description: Defines the reorder indicator up icon.

properties.name: resizableColumns
properties.description: When enabled, columns can be resized using drag and drop.

properties.name: responsiveLayout
properties.description: Defines the responsive mode, valid options are "stack" and "scroll".

properties.name: rowEditorCancelIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the row editor cancel button.

properties.name: rowEditorInitIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the row editor init button.

properties.name: rowEditorSaveIcon
properties.description: Icon to display in the row editor save button.

properties.name: rowGroupFooterTemplate
properties.description: Function to provide the content of row group footer.

properties.name: rowGroupHeaderTemplate
properties.description: Function to provide the content of row group header.

properties.name: rowGroupMode
properties.description: Defines the row grouping mode, valid values are "subheader" and "rowgroup".

properties.name: rowHover
properties.description: When enabled, background of the rows change on hover.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Number of rows to display per page.

properties.name: rowsPerPageOptions
properties.description: Array of integer values to display inside rows per page dropdown.

properties.name: scrollable
properties.description: When specified, enables horizontal and/or vertical scrolling.

properties.name: scrollHeight
properties.description: Height of the scroll viewport.

properties.name: selectAll
properties.description: When specified, selects all rows on page.

properties.name: selection
properties.description: Selected cells.

properties.name: selectionAriaLabel
properties.description: A field property from the row to add Select {field} and Unselect {field} ARIA labels to checkbox/radio buttons.

properties.name: selectionAutoFocus
properties.description: When a selectable row is clicked on RadioButton and Checkbox selection, it automatically decides whether to focus on elements such as checkbox or radio.

properties.name: selectionMode
properties.description: Specifies the selection mode, valid values are "single", "multiple", "radiobutton" and "checkbox".

properties.name: selectionPageOnly
properties.description: When enabled with paginator and checkbox selection mode, the select all checkbox in the header will select all rows on the current page.

properties.name: selectOnEdit
properties.description: Determines whether the cell editor will be opened when clicking to select any row on Selection and Cell Edit modes.

properties.name: showGridlines
properties.description: Whether to show grid lines between cells.

properties.name: showHeaders
properties.description: Whether to show headers.

properties.name: showSelectAll
properties.description: Whether to show the select all checkbox inside the datatable's header.

properties.name: size
properties.description: Define to set alternative sizes. Valid values: "small", "normal" and "large".

properties.name: sortField
properties.description: Property of a row data used for sorting, defaults to field.

properties.name: sortIcon
properties.description: Icon to display the current sorting status.

properties.name: sortMode
properties.description: Defines whether sorting works on single column or on multiple columns.

properties.name: sortOrder
properties.description: Order to sort the data by default.

properties.name: stateKey
properties.description: Unique identifier of a stateful table to use in state storage.

properties.name: stateStorage
properties.description: Defines where a stateful table keeps its state, valid values are "session" for sessionStorage, "local" for localStorage and "custom".

properties.name: stripedRows
properties.description: Whether to displays rows with alternating colors.

properties.name: style
properties.description: Inline style of the component.

properties.name: tabIndex
properties.description: Index of the element in tabbing order.

properties.name: tableClassName
properties.description: Style class of the table element.

properties.name: tableStyle
properties.description: Inline style of the table element.

properties.name: totalRecords
properties.description: Number of total records, defaults to length of value when not defined.

properties.name: unstyled
properties.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

properties.name: value
properties.description: An array of objects to display.

properties.name: virtualScrollerOptions
properties.description:
Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it.

Note: Currently only vertical orientation mode is supported.

callbacks.name: cellClassName
callbacks.description: Function that takes the cell data and returns an object in {'styleclass' : condition} format to define a classname for a particular now.

callbacks.name: customRestoreState
callbacks.description: A function to implement custom restoreState with stateStorage="custom". Need to return state object.

callbacks.name: customSaveState
callbacks.description: A function to implement custom saveState with stateStorage="custom".

callbacks.name: exportFunction
callbacks.description: A function to implement custom export. Need to return string value.

callbacks.name: isDataSelectable
callbacks.description: Function that returns a boolean to decide whether the data should be selectable.

callbacks.name: onAllRowsSelect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when all rows are selected using the header checkbox.

callbacks.name: onAllRowsUnselect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when all rows are unselected using the header checkbox.

callbacks.name: onCellClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on cell click.

callbacks.name: onCellSelect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on cell select.

callbacks.name: onCellUnselect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on cell unselect.

callbacks.name: onColReorder
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a column is reordered.

callbacks.name: onColumnResizeEnd
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a column is resized.

callbacks.name: onColumnResizerClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a resizer element is clicked.

callbacks.name: onColumnResizerDoubleClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a resizer element is double clicked.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: Custom column resizer double click event.

callbacks.name: onContextMenu
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a context menu is clicked.

callbacks.name: onContextMenuSelectionChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row selected with right click.

callbacks.name: onFilter
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on filtering.

callbacks.name: onPage
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on pagination.

callbacks.name: onRowClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is clicked.

callbacks.name: onRowCollapse
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is collapsed.

callbacks.name: onRowDoubleClick
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is double clicked.

callbacks.name: onRowEditCancel
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the cancel icon is clicked on row editing mode.

callbacks.name: onRowEditChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the editing icon is clicked on row editing mode. Use in conjuction with editingRows value from the Datatable to programmatically control editing rows.

callbacks.name: onRowEditComplete
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when row edit is completed.

callbacks.name: onRowEditInit
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the editing icon is clicked on row editing mode.

callbacks.name: onRowEditSave
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when the save icon is clicked on row editing mode.

callbacks.name: onRowExpand
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is expanded.

callbacks.name: onRowMouseEnter
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is hovered with mouse.

callbacks.name: onRowMouseLeave
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is navigated away from with mouse.

callbacks.name: onRowPointerDown
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row pointerDown event occurs.

callbacks.name: onRowPointerUp
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row pointerUp event occurs.

callbacks.name: onRowReorder
callbacks.description: Callback to update the new order.

callbacks.name: onRowSelect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is selected.

callbacks.name: onRowToggle
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is toggled or collapsed.

callbacks.name: onRowUnselect
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when a row is unselected.

callbacks.name: onSelectAllChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when select all value changes.

callbacks.name: onSelectionChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke when selection changes.

callbacks.name: onSort
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke on sort.

callbacks.name: onStateRestore
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke table state is restored.

callbacks.name: onStateSave
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke table state is saved.

callbacks.name: onValueChange
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke after filtering and sorting to pass the rendered value.

callbacks.name: rowClassName
callbacks.description: Function that takes the row data and returns an object in {'styleclass' : condition} format to define a classname for a particular now.

callbacks.name: rowEditValidator
callbacks.description: Callback to invoke to validate the editing row when the save icon is clicked on row editing mode.

callbacks.name: rowExpansionTemplate
callbacks.description: Function that receives the row data as the parameter and returns the expanded row content. You can override the rendering of the content by setting options.customRendering = true.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the row expansion template.

callbacks.name: showRowReorderElement
callbacks.description: Function that returns a boolean by passing the row data to decide if the row reorder element should be displayed per row.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the row reorder element.

callbacks.name: showSelectionElement
callbacks.description: Function that returns a boolean by passing the row data to decide if the radio or checkbox should be displayed per row.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Options for the row reorder element.

methods.name: clearState
methods.description: Clears the table state.

methods.name: closeEditingCell
methods.description: Closes the current editing cell when incell editing is enabled.

methods.name: closeEditingRows
methods.description: Closes the current editing rows when row editing is enabled.

methods.name: exportCSV
methods.description: Exports the data to CSV format.

methods.name: filter
methods.description: Filters the data.

methods.name: getElement
methods.description: Used to get container element.

methods.name: getFilterMeta
methods.description: Retrieves the currently applied filters for the data table.

methods.name: getProcessedData
methods.description: Used to get the processed data.

methods.name: getSortMeta
methods.description: Retrieves the currently applied multiple sort metadata for the data table.

methods.name: getTable
methods.description: Used to get container element.

methods.name: getVirtualScroller
methods.description: Used to get the virtual scroller.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets sort, filter, paginator and columnorder state.

methods.name: resetColumnOrder
methods.description: Resets column order when reorderableColumns is enabled.

methods.name: resetResizeColumnsWidth
methods.description: Resets resize columns width.

methods.name: resetScroll
methods.description: Resets scroll position.

methods.name: restoreColumnWidths
methods.description: Restores the column widths.

methods.name: restoreState
methods.description: Restores the table state.

methods.name: restoreTableState
methods.description: Stored states can be loaded at any time using this method if there is a stateStorage property.

methods.name: saveState
methods.description: Saves the state.

methods.name: setFilterMeta
methods.description: Sets the filters for the data table.

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filters to be applied to the data table.

methods.name: setSortMeta
methods.description: Sets the multiple sort metadata for the data table.

parameters.name: sorts
parameters.description: The sorts to be applied to the data table.
